title: Fragment, 17th–18th century
dimensions: Warp: 70 cm [27.5"] Cut top and bottom. Weft: 66 cm [26"] Left edge: cut and partially hemmed. Right edge: hemmed.
description: Blue and white damask with depictions of Jerusalem and the Spies of Eschol.

Fragment, 17th–18th century.

Technique: 7&1 satin damask.. Gift of Cora Ginsburg. 1994-103-1.
